Reviews.Title: Works great most of the time
Reviews.Author: Ray w
Reviews.Content: This is a product produces a good picture which is clear and stable most of the time but, there is one problem with the device's. I is not reliable for a security system because, It freezes the picture at times without you knowing it has happened. I look at my video at noon and it is still a frozen image of over night. I must reset the receiver in order to see a live picture from the wireless camera.

Reviews.Title: Great Product.
Reviews.Author: Dawn F. Riffell "bunnylover"
Reviews.Content: Works well in the application that we used it for. Seems like a quality product and we will buy again.

ProductInfo.Features:
2.4GHz wireless audio/video sender; dynamic selection technology to resist interference
H.264 wireless digital
Image processor MPEG4 encode/decode; variable video bit rate, up to 12 mbps
Uses random ID codes to protect personal privacy; over 4 million sets of random ID codes
With IR extender function for remote control the audio/video source; 2.4GHz transmits distance up to 1000 feet (clear line-of-sight)
ProductInfo.Name: Astrotel WD1-T/R 2.4GHz H.264 Digital Wireless Transmitter and Receiver
